Ⓢ

Game Mode

Mine has one hidden bomb. Take turns revealing tiles, but don't hit the bomb or you lose!

• Strategically choose which tiles to reveal

• Pass the turn to your opponent when you want

• Win by avoiding the mine and revealing all safe tiles

💎
Mines | Rock Paper Solana Originals
Join in on the Mines fever with one of our most popular and beloved games! Inspired by the classic Minesweeper, Mines will simply reveal the gems and avoid the bombs to increase your wins!
